content: keep little toes warm and cozy in these sweet little baby booties made with super soft baby yarn which is anti-bacterial and hypoallergenic they will be soft and gentle against baby s delicate skin this pattern is worked in the round with easy to follow instructions they are simple and quick to work up matching hat and mittens also available you are welcome to sell the items you make with this pattern but please give me krazy kabbage a mention in your sales listing and provide a link to my website www krazykabbage com loops & threads wellness baby fine weight 70% acrylic 30% amicor acrylic in turquoise you will need crochet hook size d/3 3 25mm tape measure to check size yarn needle to weave in ends this pattern uses us terminology stitches and terms used single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet two together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch back loop only blo back post bp
